about_the_game:
It is an immersive storyline puzzle game designed specifically for players who love rich storylines. The story is set on a warm Christmas night, where players take on the role of a curious pair of siblings, exploring the mysterious space in their home - their bedroom. The game adopts a delicate hand drawn style, creating a strong festive atmosphere and nostalgic atmosphere. The graphics are exquisite and detailed, from the sparkling Christmas tree to the wardrobe full of memories, every scene and object is lifelike.

In the game, players need to click and interact to conduct in-depth searches in various corners of the room, such as wardrobes, desks, and even wall decorations, to discover hidden clues and objects. These items will be used to solve a series of carefully designed puzzles and drive the plot forward. At the same time, the game is equipped with melodious and pleasant Christmas music and vivid and realistic sound effects, making players feel as if they are immersed in that suspenseful and warm winter night, enjoying a heartbeat moment that combines family, adventure, and wisdom.
